Uses of ContentInputBuffer in org.apache.http.nio.util
 

Classes in org.apache.http.nio.util that implement ContentInputBuffer
 class SharedInputBuffer
          Implementation of the ContentInputBuffer interface that can be shared by multiple threads, usually the I/O dispatch of an I/O reactor and a worker tread.
 class SimpleInputBuffer
          Simple implementation of the ContentInputBuffer interface.
